name: Comfort
description:
Created in 2 days for the Self Care Jam 2.

It's more like a relaxing screensaver than a game.

It's a lil' scruffy currently as I'd put aside 3 days to make this  but something cropped up and it dropped to 2. I'll put aside a day soon to refine it a little more. So currently the picture frames on the walls are ominously empty and the main menu looks really excellent.

The only two functions in the scene currently are  pressing the weather dial above the window changes the weather and clicking the bell around the cats neck changes the background music.

Controls

left mouse button to interact & ESC key to return to main menu.
